title: Download stalled
body: I have been installing LoL all morning. It was fine amd had a very steady spees the entire duration. However, once the applying patches of step 2 reached 79% the installation has stalled. It has not moved in 2 hours. But I have not gotten any messages about a failure to install or anything like that. Help.

replies.body:
Issues after 33% typically are caused by the patcher losing its connection to our patching servers. I encourage you to check out the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
... six hours. Six hours. What the hell!?!?
